affiliation.en: Niigata University Faculty of Science, Department of Chemistry, Organic and Biological Chemistry

description.en: Thermal decomposition of N-alkylated 2-aminobenzophenones 1a-d was studied at 400-560 degrees C, using calcium oxide as catalyst. The reactions yielded both 5- and 6-membered heterocyclic compounds. The N-methylated-2-aminobenzophenones 1a-b decomposed at 400-560 T to give 2-phenylindole 2 (47% at 500 degrees C from 1b), acridine 4 and phenanthridine 5, while the N-benzylated-2-aminobenzophenones 1c-d decomposed at 400-560 degrees C to give 2,3-diphenylindole 3 (33% at 450 degrees C and 400 degrees C from 1c and 1d, respectively), acridine 4 and phenanthridine 5.

Thermal decomposition of N-alkylated 2-aminobenzophenones 1a-d was studied at 400-560 degrees C, using calcium oxide as catalyst. The reactions yielded both 5- and 6-membered heterocyclic compounds. The N-methylated-2-aminobenzophenones 1a-b decomposed at 400-560 T to give 2-phenylindole 2 (47% at 500 degrees C from 1b), acridine 4 and phenanthridine 5, while the N-benzylated-2-aminobenzophenones 1c-d decomposed at 400-560 degrees C to give 2,3-diphenylindole 3 (33% at 450 degrees C and 400 degrees C from 1c and 1d, respectively), acridine 4 and phenanthridine 5.

paper_title.en: Chlorination of aliphatic hydrocarbons, aromatic compounds, and olefins in subcritical carbon tetrachloride

description.en: The reactions of various substrates including aliphatic hydrocarbons, aromatic compounds, and olefins were investigated in subcritical carbon tetrachloride. Ketones and sulfones were stable under the employed conditions. The coupling adducts between olefins and carbon tetrachloride were obtained from the reactions of olefins. (C) 2008 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.

paper_title.en: Thermal reactions of N-alkyl-2-benzyl aniline and N-alkyl-N'-phenyl-o-phenylenediamine: An unusual route to 2-phenylindole and 2-phenylbenzimidazole

description.en: Thermal cyclization reactions of N-alkyl-2-benzylaniline 1a-d and N-alkyl-N'-phenyl-o-phenylenediamine 2a-b were carried out expecting to get seven-membered heterocyclic compounds. However, the results show that aside from the formation of the normally expected six-membered ring products of acridine 5, anthracene 6, and phenazine 8, thermal cyclization of N-alkyl-2-benzylaniline and N-alkyl-N'-phenyl-o-phenylenediamine also resulted to the unexpected fort-nation of 2-phenylindole 3 and 2,3-diphenylindole 4, and 2-phenylbenzimidazole 7, respectively.

paper_title.en: A new method for thin silver coating reaction using Ag2O and polyethylene glycol 400

description.en: A new method for thin silver coating reactions using Ag2O and polyethylene glycol 400, an environmentally benign solvent, was devised. The reactions were investigated using H-1 NMR, IR, UV-vis, SEM, and XPS measurements.

paper_title.en: Synthesis and structure of 8-hydroxy-6-methoxy-3,7-dimethylisochromane and its analogues

description.en: The title compound I was obtained by the reaction of alcohol 18 and triethyl orthoformate catalyzed by aluminum chloride followed by catalytic hydrogenation in good yield. Similarly, compounds 1 and 3 were obtained by intramolecular cyclization of MOM ether 19 with titanium(W) chloride in moderate yields and isochromanes 1, 3, 26 and 27 by intramolecular cyclization of ether 20 with titanium(IV) chloride in high yields. The structures of compounds 1-3 were elucidated by analysis of spectroscopic data and chemical reactions. The mechanisms on the formation of 1 and 3 are discussed. (c) 2006 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.

paper_title.ja: Thermal Decomposition Reactions of N-alkylated 2-Aminobiphenyls to Carbazole and Phenanthridine

paper_title.en: Chemoselective reduction of aldehydes in the presence of ketones with NaBH4 in polyethylene glycol dimethyl ethers

description.en: Aldehydes and ketones were treated with NaBH4 in polyethylene glycol dimethyl ethers (PEGDME) to give the corresponding alcohols in good yields. Chemoselective reduction of aldehydes in the presence of ketones was described.

paper_title.ja: Aldol Condensation in Water Using Polyethylene 400
A mild and efficient procedure for α-bromination of ketones using N-bromosuccinimide catalysed by ammonium acetate
paper_title.en: A mild and efficient procedure for alpha-bromination of ketones using N-bromosuccinimide catalysed by ammonium acetate

description.en: Cyclic ketones reacted with N-bromosuccinimide (NBS) catalysed by NH4OAc in Et2O at 25degreesC to give the corresponding alpha-brominated ketones in good yields, while acyclic ketones were efficiently brominated in CCl4 at 80degreesC.

paper_title.ja: Synthesis of Carbazole, Acridine, Phenazine, 4H-Benzo[def]carbazole and Their Derivatives by Thermal Cyclization Reactions of Aromatic Amines

paper_title.en: A mild and efficient method for the mononitration of aromatic compounds by cerium(III) ammonium nitrate in acetic anhydride

description.en: A mild and efficient method for the mononitration of aromatic and olefinic compounds is described. This method is especially useful for active substrates.

paper_title.ja: Halogenation of Aromatic Compounds by N-chloro-, N-bromo-, and N-iodosuccinimide
Photocyclization Reactions. Part 8 [1]. Synthesis of 2-Quinolone, Quinoline and Coumarin Derivatives Using Trans-Cis Isomerization by Photoreaction
Formation of adamantan-1-ols by the reactions of adamantanes with 2,3-dichloro-5,6-dicycano-p-benzoquinone (DDQ) in trifluoromethanesulfonic acid
Cleavage of 2-Methoxyethoxy Ethers Catalyzed by Cerium (IV) Ammonium Nitrate (CAN) in Acetic Anhydride

paper_title.en: Cleavage of protecting groups catalysed by TT-acceptorsj

description.en: The cleavage of protecting groups is caused by the acidic adducts produced from the methanolysis of acceptors.

publication_name.en: Journal of Chemical Research - Part S

description.en: Cyclohepta[cd]benzothiophene 3, a new heterocyle, was synthesized starting from benzothiophene via eight steps in 14% total yield. Chemical reactions of 3 were examined on formylation, acetylation, bromination, catalytic hydrogenation and Diels-Alder reactions. The results show that the benzothiophene moiety of 3 has aromatic character and the carbon-carbon double bonds in a seven-membered ring possesses alkene-like character.

paper_title.en: Unexpected formation of benzaldehydes by the reactions of dithioacetals derived from cinnamaldehydes with 2,3-dichloro-5,6-dicyano-p-benzoquinone in aqueous solvents

description.en: 1,3-Dithianes 1, 1,3-dithiolanes 2, and diphenyl dithioacetals 3 derived from cinnamaldehydes reacted with 2,3-dichloro-5,6-dicyano-p-benzoquinone in aqueous solvents to give benzaldehydes 4. Hydride transfer from 1-3 to 2,3-dichloro-5,6-dicyano-p-benzoquinone followed by hydrolysis and oxidative carbon-carbon bond cleavage would produce benzaldehydes 4.

book_title.ja: Trends in Heterocyclic Chemistry, Volume 6, 1-19, 'Synthesis of benzofurans using photocyclization reactions of aromatic carbonyl compounds'
